plot outline: Jayarama is a blind handyman who works in an apartment complex. Jayarama's world is turned upside down when a retired Supreme Court judge who lives there entrusts him with a secret and makes him his daughter's guardian, right before he is murdered. Vowing to protect the young girl at any cost, Jayarama now has to deal with Vasudeva, a vengeful serial killer.
title: Kavacha
plot: A blind man bonds with a young girl, and would go to great lengths to protect her from a serial killer.

Jayarama is a blind handyman who works in an apartment complex. Jayarama's world is turned upside down when a retired Supreme Court judge who lives there entrusts him with a secret and makes him his daughter's guardian, right before he is murdered. Vowing to protect the young girl at any cost, Jayarama now has to deal with Vasudeva, a vengeful serial killer.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
